title: Frequent Disconnects and delayed actions every minute or so
body: So this problem started happened around 6.19 where it was just a simple delayed action every few MINUTES, now this is starting to happen almost every minute of the game. Disconnects are starting to happen and this simply is putting me at an inability to play league anymore, not sure if it is on Riots side or mine, but if this is a problem anyone else is experiencing i would like to know so if i should submit this as a support ticket or just a discussion. I made sure everything was up to date.

replies.body:
These issues are typically results of *Packet loss* or packet buffering. Since local network settings play a big part in this, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a start in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps helped.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/UcwWHzsV-something-interesting-about-lag-issues-in-na?comment=00010000

Use this and it might show the problem!!!
